Description.Html: have a full UK or EU driving licence, held for at least 3 years
be on the Gas Safe Register to work with domestic gas heating systems

TitlePart.Title: UK, Republic of Ireland or Commonwealth Citizen

Description.Html: be a UK, Republic of Ireland or Commonwealth citizen

data.DisplayText: UK, Republic of Ireland or Commonwealth Citizen
data.Author: admin

Description.Html: have a full UK or EU driving licence, held for at least 12 months, or 3 years if working in London

TitlePart.Title: complete basic sea safety training – STCW – approved by the Maritime and Coastguard Agency

Description.Html: complete basic sea safety training – STCW – approved by the Maritime and Coastguard Agency

data.DisplayText: complete basic sea safety training – STCW – approved by the Maritime and Coastguard Agency
data.Author: admin

Description.Html: be a citizen of an EU member state
have a Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) - this is known as the Driver CPC
live within 1 hour's travel of the depot you're applying to
pass a local geography test, known as 'The Knowledge' if working in London
a boxing licence from the British Boxing Board of Control
meet the British army nationality and residency rules
have lived in the UK for the last 3 years
pass enhanced background checks, as you may be working with children and vulnerable adults

TitlePart.Title: C1 or C LGV Driving Licence

Description.Html: have a category C1 or C LGV licence if driving mobile cranes on public roads

data.DisplayText: C1 or C LGV Driving Licence
data.Author: admin

Description.Html: hold a Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) issued by the Civil Aviation Authority (CAA)
have between 1 and 2 years' experience of driving lorries
have the ability to swim 50 metres fully clothed
be able to speak a second EU language
meet the Royal Marines officer nationality and residency rules
be able to cope with working at height
be over 18 to sell alcohol and other restricted goods
if you work in London, you'll need to meet the English language requirement

TitlePart.Title: have a Certificate of Competence, if you carry out hazardous tasks like using chainsaws or handling pesticides

Description.Html: have a Certificate of Competence, if you carry out hazardous tasks like using chainsaws or handling pesticides

data.DisplayText: have a Certificate of Competence, if you carry out hazardous tasks like using chainsaws or handling pesticides
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: Age - Over 18, 21 in some areas incl London

Description.Html: be over 18 but over 21 in some areas, including London

data.DisplayText: Age - Over 18, 21 in some areas incl London
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: life-saving certificate for instructing water-based activities

Description.Html: have a life-saving certificate if you instruct water-based activities

data.DisplayText: life-saving certificate for instructing water-based activities
data.Author: admin

Description.Html: pass the Civil Aviation Authority medical before you can take a course - the medical includes tests on your fitness, hearing and vision
have lived in the UK for the last 5 years
have a driving licence that includes LGV for lorries, or PCV for buses, if you work with these vehicles
have forklift truck driver training for some jobs
be able to read a licence plate at 90 feet or 27.5m, with glasses or contact lenses if worn
